showerReviews.reviewText: These are the reason to bring your own shower stuff, I went to have my shower and look at this mess. The cleaner didn't do a good job they rushing the showers and even after I went in I still could feel the heat of the person who was in ‚Ä¶

Showers are a broom closet  no way can 2 people  use 1 shower when asking staff if u can use the bigger shower they come up with all kind of excuses why u can't that they have to keep it available for handicap. And when will a handicap be ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ than a gal of gas. Tell us you don't care without telling us you don't care. Flying j is getting to be just as bad as love's. Showers are the same way. I run cross country and hit showers as low as $8. These clowns are right up there ‚Ä¶
Got a code for the  shower get to the door and put code in  someone was in the shower.  Smh they got to do better had to wait an hour to get another shower ..smh

5 stars for the showers. First time using a truck stop shower and had low expectations. Well, I was very impressed with the service and cleanliness of the private showers. The areas outside them (hallways) were dirty and the store itself. H ‚Ä¶

Yay
Love taking a shower in a broom closet.
Whoever‚Äôs idea it was to make the shower rooms this small outta be dealt with.
Straight BS
Today at 5 am plenty parking. Shower are clean and also the store has nice people I will always stop here. Always parking thank u for clean shower and good customer service.. You guys rock!!!

Dirty is the best way to describe this location.   Showers are not properly cleaned.     Display cases dirty.   Coffee machines and pop machines are not cleaned.   Dirt all over front.   Staff friendly!   Previous users soap left in shower. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ great. Awesome staff. So, the reason for 1 star is the horror shower. I was in stall 3, and the water kinda dribbled out, it's tiiiiiny, and the temp kept going from cold to melt your skin off without touching the handle. Would not ‚Ä¶

Showers closed down after we paid for showers due to ac not working. My hubby and I had to share a shower because the workers didn't want to clean more showers bc of the heat. Shower was later credit to free bc of the sharing by the young ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ Picked towels from shower pile and using ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I went in to use the shower and the images speak for themselves about how these bathing rooms are not getting cleaned. ‚Ä¶
Small lot not to many parking for trucks, hot shower fresh hot dogs, clean pumps

terrible manager , fueled at 2 am not a soul in fuel islands. moved over to broken pump (which was coned off) and went in for a shower and was told I was not able to park there so I left. inconsiderate management! I  was just trying to ‚Ä¶

This is acceptable. There is light frothing from hydrogen peroxide at the entry of the shower. You can not tell me that Love's cleaning solution interacts with hydrogen peroxide to cause foaming. There are drops on the wall free from ‚Ä¶
Nice size truck stop with a truck wash on premise. Clean shower but hot water wasn't so hot just on the very warm side .

‚Ä¶ Also everything from laptop computers and dash cams to socks and gloves. Plenty of parking room for semi truck and clean shower. Close to two major shippers Walmart DC and arm and Hammer. And lumber treatment plant
Had to get a new shower as the one we were assigned didn't have hot water it was like warm at most, and then this was the shower we were put in. Absolutely disgusting to have mold everywhere
The shower's are huge, very clean good water pressure, hot water, are just maybe its a brand new love,s come back in about 3 months, and see if I can still give them 5 stars. ü§£ü§£ ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Sapp Bros. Travel Center
locations.content: Sapp Bros. Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: We stopped here before our delivery to take a shower and fuel up. The fuel islands were packed, but the other trucks before us moved rather quickly. The inside is very clean and easy to navigate. The showers are absolutely amazing size and ‚Ä¶

I was there for being my first time.   But shower #1 had no soap dispenser and one door hook. But my company doesn't fuel there. So I ended up paying $15 in which I don't mind.  Breakfast was awesome the people are great.  They actually ‚Ä¶
The family bathroom is awesome! Clean and has a section that is toddler-sized. Also has a shower.
Shower room is roomy with nice towels! Clean, well taken care of!  Professional Friendly Staff, this is the place to be...
‚Ä¶ Truckers have a super shower area, fuel island, mechanic shop and great parking. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly people. BUT it's impossible to get fuel because the truck drivers use the fuel island as parking without even getting fuel! They go in and eat or shower while their trucks block the fuel pumps! Please do something about this!

This people are human I forget her name I woke up 1 hr before my 10 hr break I didn‚Äôt have a shower in my app I was going to fuel later after my 10 hr break I told them my situation that I will fuel later but I need shower for now Wow let ‚Ä¶

This is the third time I came here in the morning between 4am and 7am and the same cashier has told me there are no showers till 7am. That is the only time I can shower after my Walmart delivery. Which I arrived at sapp brothers at 545am ‚Ä¶

Only complaint is the showers. Attn. Sapp Bro's management.  If you're going 2 charge large chain prices 4 showers then have the decency to provide towels like every other trkstp I've ever been to and showered.  At least  let us know u ‚Ä¶

Hands down the cleanest truckstop I've been to inside and outside. Shower #5 had a his/hers sink, blow dryer, fan, toilet, beautiful walk-in shower and a BATH TUB! Great water pressure and nice HOT water. Nice restaurant to sit down to eat. ‚Ä¶
